title: Product Design Engineer - Watch
summary: Be an integral part of a small and visible team of world-class Mechanical Engineers making Apple’s first wearable product line. Define and design Apple’s future wearable product line.
description: This position will require international travel (15%+). You will work closely with cross-functional teams to bring future Apple products to life and promote innovation and new technology.
key_qualifications:
BSME, MS preferred
3-7 years in detailed part and product design
CAD and drawings (GD&T)
Plastic and metal part design
Strong materials knowledge
Design for Manufacturability, Design for Assembly
Analytical and problem-solving skills as applied to Mechanical Engineering
Mass-production
Working knowledge of FEA
Application of statistical tools and techniques
Experience working with overseas manufacturers
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder and receive benefits including comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, and reimbursement for certain educational expenses.
